author: svn-role
msg: Fix issue 4412, locks lost from working copy with pre-1.6.17 servers.
Regression from 1.7, makes using locks hard.
r1584342 is the fix, r1581810 is a test that fails with a 1.6.16 server.

author: svn-role

author: svn-role
msg: 1.8 claims 0.9 support but it doesn't work.

author: svn-role
msg: Code may rely on null byte being present.

author: svn-role
msg: Merge the r1545835 group from trunk:
Prevent use with known buggy versions of httpd.
Signal to our packagers that these versions have issues that they either
need to upgrade or patch around.
